content: The irony is that Harden, while on the receiving end of the “best player on the best team”-equation last season against Steph, might find himself on the same bad end of a different equation this time. Namely: your attempt is futile when Evil Russ decides to average a triple-double — although Harden’s team is clearly the best team that mainly relies on one player. Anxious for the players’ MVP voting…
